item.title: php把html转换为png图片（支持js动态渲染）
item.description: 全局安装 curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer 替换国内镜像 composer config -g repo.packagist composer https://packagist.phpcomposer.com composer require anam/phantommagick composer require anam/phantomjs-linux-x86-binary 下载mac版phantomjs， wget https://bitbucket.org/ariya/phantomjs/downloads/phantomjs-2.1.1-macosx.zip 然后 cp -rf /Users/liuli/Downloads/phantomjs-2.1.1-macosx/ /Users/liuli/work/test/vendor/anam/phantomjs-linux-x86-binary/ 运行代码 require_once "vendor/autoload.php"; use Anam\PhantomMagick\Converter; $conv = new \Anam\PhantomMagick\Converter(); $conv->source('http://baidu.com') ->toPng() ->save('baidu.png'); 第二次更新 后来遇到需要支持js渲染的页面， 还是安装phantomjs（免安装版），下载rasterize.js，执行命令即可。 phantomjs rasterize.js "url" "pdf保存路径" 下边是自己用的批量的脚本 #/bin/bash #set -v -x . param.sh for i in "${ar[@]}" ; do b=($i) #此时b就相当于二维数组里面的一维数组了，然后可以再次遍历 uigId=${b[0]} uId=${b[1]} goodsId=${b[2]} money=${b[3]} buaId=${b[4]} path="pdf/${buaId}/${uigId}_${uId}.

item.title: mitmproxy不能加载openssl的问题
item.description: 安装openssl-1.0.2j ./config --prefix=/usr/local/ssl -fPIC shared && make && make install ###安装python-2.7.12 vim Python-2.7.12/Modules/Setup 去掉这4行注释 #SSL=/usr/local/ssl #_ssl _ssl.c \ # -DUSE_SSL -I$(SSL)/include -I$(SSL)/include/openssl \ # -L$(SSL)/lib -lssl -lcrypto ./configure --prefix=/home/work/lib/python-2.7.12 && make && make install ln -s /home/work/lib/python-2.7.12/bin/python /usr/local/bin/python 安装mitmproxy python get-pip.py pip install mitmproxy 运行mitmproxy，报错提示 “ImportError: /home/work/lib/python-2.7.12/lib/python2.7/site-packages/cryptography/hazmat/bindings/_openssl.so: undefined symbol: EC_GROUP_new_curve_GF2m” ldd /home/work/lib/python-2.7.12/lib/python2.7/site-packages/cryptography/hazmat/bindings/_openssl.so 发现加载的动态链接是旧版本openssl 增加动态库搜索目录 echo "/usr/local/ssl/lib" >> /etc/ld.so.conf ldconfig python -c "import ssl; print ssl.
